cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.6)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 20)
set(CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/vcpkg/scripts/buildsystems/vcpkg.cmake
  CACHE STRING "vcpkg toolchain file")

if(MSVC)
  # Disable warnings generated by protobuf lib and dominate output.
  add_compile_options(/wd4146)
  add_compile_options(/wd4251)
  add_compile_options(/wd4996)

  # Needed for MSVC until abseil becomes compatible with C++20.
  add_definitions(-D_HAS_DEPRECATED_RESULT_OF)
endif()

project(espy)

include_directories(".")
include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

find_package(absl CONFIG REQUIRED)
find_package(catch2 CONFIG REQUIRED)
find_package(glog CONFIG REQUIRED) 
find_package(nlohmann_json CONFIG REQUIRED)
find_package(unofficial-curlpp CONFIG REQUIRED)

if(UNIX AND NOT APPLE)
  find_package(TBB REQUIRED)
endif()

find_package(Protobuf REQUIRED)
include_directories(${PROTOBUF_INCLUDE_DIRS})

include(CTest)
include(Catch)

add_subdirectory(proto)
add_subdirectory(igdb)
add_subdirectory(json)
add_subdirectory(steam)
add_subdirectory(util)

add_executable(espy "main.cpp")
target_link_libraries(espy PRIVATE
  igdb_api_proto
  igdb_service
  key_parser
  library_proto
  proto_util
  reconciliation_task_proto
  steam_library
  steam_service

  absl::flags_parse
  TBB::tbb
)
